ConfigurationOption.Value: select ib.itemnum, it.description, ib.location, ib.binnum, ib.lotnum, ib.conditioncode, ib.itemsetid, ib.curbal, ib.physcnt, ib.physcntdate, ib.reconciled, ( ib.physcntdate + iv.ccf ) countby, iv.abctype, il.shelflife, il.useby, it.lottype, it.rotating, it.iskit, it.itemtype, ib.stagingbin, ib.siteid, ib.orgid, iv.inventoryid, ib.invbalancesid from invbalances ib left join inventory iv on ib.itemnum = iv.itemnum and ib.location = iv.location and ib.itemsetid = iv.itemsetid and ib.siteid = iv.siteid left join invlot il on ib.itemnum = il.itemnum and ib.location = il.location and ib.lotnum = il.lotnum and ib.itemsetid = il.itemsetid and ib.siteid = il.siteid left join item it on ib.itemnum = it.itemnum and ib.itemsetid = it.itemsetid

EventAction.Condition: ${invbalancesid} is null and nvl( ${Site} ) is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: The specified item was not found (${MX_LOOKUP_SCANNED_ITEM})
